name: Glittery Business
description:
You are a shopkeeper who is buying stuff from customers for the exact price. Your goal is to be as close as possible to pay the price as precisely as you can. Use the mouse to control the vessel and LMB or RMB to rotate it to gather coins. Once you are done, you can hold space to confirm your result before timer finishes. 
Prove that you are the best shopkeeper in the kingdom!
